channel.title: Small Help
channel.description:
I downloaded a source and client 508 HD and when i run the client I got this error: EDIT: MORE INFO: It's stop at the "3rd library" when i run the client.
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/34yvj9w.png[/img]
How i can fix this?

item.title: Small Help
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Cache should usually be placed in the root directory of C:/

Read full topic

item.title: Small Help
item.dc:creator: @Naseem Naseem
item.description:
@Naseem wrote:

[quote=“The Web Guy, post:2, topic:458131”]It’s something with the cache being placed un-correct. Where do you have it placed and saved as?
And also, DLL files are basically libraries that contain data, they/it can be used by multiple programs at the same time, and the HD client is using resources from specific DLL files, however if the cache is place in-correctly, you’ll receive this problem.[/quote]

Well, I just downloaded this client and source from HERE

And i didn’t change the cache loction after i downloaded it.

Any ideas how i can fix this problem?

Read full topic

item.title: Small Help
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

It’s something with the cache being placed un-correct. Where do you have it placed and saved as?
And also, DLL files are basically libraries that contain data, they/it can be used by multiple programs at the same time, and the HD client is using resources from specific DLL files, however if the cache is place in-correctly, you’ll receive this problem.

Read full topic
